entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
